name: Self-Sufficient Energy and Resources
description: Creating independent infrastructure for water, food, and energy to sustain parallel societies.

cards.title: Energy Independence Through Decentralized Power
cards.description: Developing sustainable and resilient power solutions.
bulletpoints: Implementing microgrid technologies and decentralized power generation.
Utilizing solar, wind, hydro, and other off-grid energy sources.
Creating energy storage systems for long-term sustainability.

cards.title: Water Security and Independent Supply Chains
cards.description: Ensuring access to clean and self-sustaining water resources.
bulletpoints: Developing rainwater harvesting and purification systems.
Utilizing atmospheric water generators for off-grid water security.
Setting up decentralized water filtration for long-term sustainability.

cards.title: Regenerative Agriculture and Food Sovereignty
cards.description: Establishing food independence through sustainable farming techniques.
bulletpoints: Implementing permaculture and closed-loop farming methods.
Using aquaponics and vertical farming for maximum food production efficiency.
Creating community food reserves for long-term self-reliance.
